overview:
Bill Braasch is a software entrepreneur focused in enterprise technologies. He is CEO of DataBase Architects, Inc., headquartered in Emeryville California.

DataBase Architects operates two software businesses:

Kalinda Software provides content management software for the IBM CICS platform. The company’s OnLine Help, OnLine Notepad and OnLine Reference products support customer facing business units across multiple industries.

{item:foo} is a development stage business focused on rich web application tools. {item:foo} is the publisher of the itemscript JSON libraries.

Bill Braasch graduated from Lewis University with a BA in Mathematics. He lives with his wife and children in Oakland, California.
